Olivier Assayas' film stars Asia Argento as a woman who had a relationship with Michael Madsen. Madsen is a business man who is hiding his identity in a village in the company of a Däemons – the man gets married an is welcomed by other villagers. Assayas' has a way to present modern urban mythography without lurid sensationalness, which is something to be valued.
